Header: NTJ Colombo district coordinator further remanded
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Colombo District Coordinator of the banned National Thawheed Jamaath, Mohamed Farook Mohamed Fawaz was remanded until the 07th of May by Colombo Additional Magistrate Priyantha Liyanage. The Additional Magistrate ordered the investigators to report the progress of the investigations on the same day (May 07).
